Hello, 

I am new to J2EE and I would really appreciate some help on testing 
my app. 

It is similar to the Pet Store example and consists of EJBs, JSPs and 
Servlets. 

Could someone please clarify how I go about unit testing these 
components. 

Also, could someone please clarify which libraries / tools I use. 
I have searched the WEB and found the following: 

1) JUnit3.7 

2) Test Infected (from JavaWorld) - which includes JUnit but has 
extra things such as Packer.bat which builds a Test EJB. 

3) Cactus - which addresses JSP and Servlet testing but ignores (as 
far as I can tell) EJBs. 

4) JUnitEE - Which seems to be very similar to the Test Infected 
stuff from JavaWorld 

Any help would be greatly appreciated... 

Thanks 
Gavin
subject: J2EE Help
